attributes.action: Make PSHE compulsory in every child's education in KS2-4 (10-16 year olds)
attributes.additional_details:
How can PSHE education benefit children in the UK? 
- reduce aggressive behavior
- improve social skills
- provides children with support on personal issues  
- improve academic performance
- prepare pupils for life after school
- improve health and happiness levels
- develop knowledge of personal issues
attributes.background: The current Government status states that PSHE (personal, social and health education) is un-statutory meaning that thousands of children across the UK receive either irregular PSHE education delivered by non-specialists or none at all. Sign this petition now and support our stand for child rights.
